byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The American natural-gas pipeline giant turned down an unsolicited proposal from Energy Transfer Equity, its former rival in a bidding war for Southern Union Company.

headline.main: Williams Companies Rejects $48 Billion Takeover Offer

snippet: The American natural-gas pipeline giant turned down an unsolicited proposal from Energy Transfer Equity, its former rival in a bidding war for Southern Union Company.
